title: Breathing Underwater
description: Nick is one of the chosen few at his high school: intelligent, popular, and wealthy. People think his life is pretty easy. Except for one thing. Nick has never told anyone about his father's violent temper.When Nick meets Caitlin, he thinks she is the answer to all his problems. Caitlin is everything Nick has ever wanted: beautiful, talented, and in love with him. But then everything changes, and Nick must face the fact that he has gotten more from his father than green eyes and money.
author: Alex Flinn
